average. like this -------------------. I'm working on the intersection of consciousness and space. Deepening my experience with the mundane. Currently fascinated with time and infrared energy. Historically, I was an applied physicist until everything I did turned into a weapon.

Very much into: search technology, alternative digital knowledge linking, research workflows, small/indie web, and digital accessibility. Defaces corporations and mainstream politics for praxis and also amusement.

Absgender anarchist transhumanist. I only see the future and feel helpless to the present.
